description:
Minimal effort, maximum results

The Veggie & Flower Garden Plan optimizes your flower and veggie garden's health with our nutrient-rich fertilizer and soil amendment.

Our annual plan features our Flower & Organic Garden Fertilizer for luscious flowers, Veggie & Tomato Organic Garden Fertilizer for healthy vegetables and herbs, and our innovative Soil Booster Soil Amendment to enrich the garden bed soil.

sections.standard_annual_plan_highlights:
Boost bloom nutrition with 4-4-6 NPK (Nitrogen-Phosphorus-Potassium) Flower & Organic Garden Fertilizer
Enhanced fruit and veggie production from 5-4-5 NPK Veggie & Tomato Organic Garden Fertilizer
Improved soil health from Organic Soil Booster, rich in nutrients and microbes
Sustainable gardening with organic and natural formulations
Made for all veggie and flower gardens , including ornamental, vegetable, and herb gardens
User-friendly , with a hose-end garden sprayer for easy application
Up to 200 sq. ft. coverage , perfect for veggie gardens, flower beds, and containers
sections.whats_included:
Flower & Organic Garden Fertilizer: Prevents excess leaf growth, promotes blooms
Veggie & Tomato Organic Garden Fertilizer: Boosts flower and fruit production
Sunday Organics Soil Booster Soil Amendment: Enhances soil health and nutrient uptake
sections.instructions:
For flowers and ornamentals, use Flower & Organic Garden Fertilizer according to the package instructions.
For veggies and herbs, apply Veggie & Tomato Organic Garden Fertilizer, following package instructions.
Connect the hose-end sprayer to the Soil Boost container. Apply Soil Boost evenly across your garden beds to enhance soil health.
Reapply Soil Boost at least 3 times in a season and up to once per week. Apply plant food mixes every 4-6 weeks throughout the growing season.
sections.faq:
Helpful Tips from Lawn Advisors:
How do annual plans work?
Sunday’s Veggie & Flower Garden Plan is a comprehensive kit in one simple shipment delivered annually.
Can I use these products on all types of garden plants?
The Veggie & Flower Kit is designed for a wide range of garden plants, including flowers, vegetables, herbs, and even houseplants. For trees, shrubs, and other woody plants, we recommend WonderFert Tree & Shrub.
How often should I apply the Soil Boost and plant food mixes?
Apply the Veggie & Tomato and Flower & Rose every 4-6 weeks. Use Soil Booster at least three times during the growing season, up to once per week for optimal growth and microbial benefits.
Are these products safe for edible plants?
Absolutely! The Veggie & Tomato, Flower & Rose, and Soil Booster are safe and effective for use on edible plants, ensuring a healthy and bountiful harvest.
Can these products be used in organic gardens?
Soil Booster, Flower & Rose, and Veggie & Tomato Organic Garden Nutrients can be used for organic gardening. For other organic gardening fertilizer options, check out our All-Purpose Garden Nutrients.
